articles.title: How quantum physics could 'revolutionise everything' - BBC.com
articles.description: From unhackable communication networks to powerful computers, quantum technology promises huge advances.

articles.author: Dominic-Madori Davis and Amanda Silberling
articles.title: The Kendrick-Drake feud shows how technology is changing rap battles - TechCrunch
articles.description: The feud between Kendrick Lamar and Drake highlights technology’s increased role in rap beefs, in addition to how and when AI should be used in music.
articles.content: It seems were all in agreement: Kendrick Lamar defeated Drake in one of the most engrossing rap battles of the decade. To add insult to injury, Drake also threw himself into legal hot water when he d… [+9388 chars]
